game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the old dungeon
game.description: You are tasked with recovering a lost artifact of great importance. It is said to be hidden deep within an ancient dungeon, filled with unknown perils and dangers. Proceed with caution!

task.objective: Find the location of the dungeon
task.description: Consult with the town's elders to discover the location of the ancient dungeon.
Explore the dungeon, overcome its dangers, and retrieve the lost artifact. Be prepared for anything!
